title: Angular behaviour with no cores is incorrect
description:
Angular UI should, when no cores are present, hide the main display and auto-pop-up the add core dialog.

Also, the core selector should be hidden when no cores exist.

comments.author: Upayavira
comments.content:
Patch that:

	hides core selector
	shows add dialog when no cores present
	ensures collection/shard handled in Cloud mode
	hides collection/shard when not in cloud mode
	hides detail panes when no cores present
